name: Parkan: Iron Strategy
description: Parkan: Iron Strategy is a perfect mix of advanced real-time strategy and futuristic warbot simulator with FPS elements in a highly realistic environment.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 1.8 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 9
